Get ESPN NBA player box scores

Source: R/espn_nba_data.R
espn_nba_player_box.Rd

Get ESPN NBA player box scores

Usage

espn_nba_player_box(game_id)

Arguments

game_id

Game ID

Value

A player boxscore data frame

Author

Saiem Gilani

Examples

# \donttest{
  try(espn_nba_player_box(game_id = 401283399))
